testcase.system-out: Given a user launches the browser...........................................passed And a user launches eBay web application....................................passed When a user clicks on the Help & Contact link...............................passed And a user enters text into the search input element........................passed And a user clicks on an specific help article...............................passed Then a help article will be displayed.......................................passed And related help topics will be displayed...................................passed And a user can browse related help topics with next slide button............passed
